personal.name: Tawona
personal.title: Full Stack Software Developer
personal.subtitle: Specializing in designing and maintaining scalable, high-performing web and mobile applications. Skilled in e-commerce, AI, and system integration.

about.description: I'm a passionate Full-stack Software Developer with expertise in designing and maintaining scalable, high-performing web and mobile applications. I specialize in collaborating with cross-functional teams and have extensive experience in e-commerce, AI, and system integration. I graduated with First Class Honors in Software Engineering and have been recognized as the Most Consistent Undergraduate Student in my faculty.
highlights: BSc Hons. Software Engineering (First Class) - University of Zimbabwe
Key developer of TM Pick n Pay e-commerce platform (100k+ users)
Delivered 2+ full-featured e-commerce platforms and 10+ websites
Expert in full-stack development with modern technologies
Experience with cross-functional teams using Scrum methodologies

experiences.description: Key developer of TM Pick n Pay e-commerce webstore used by over 100k customers. Primary developer of the Gramia web and mobile app. Implementing data encryption and secure authentication systems.
Power BI, SQL development, Python scripting, and Linux system support for Econet customer experience. Implementing data encryption/secure authentication to CEM SmartCare Econet Platform.
Delivered 2+ full-featured e-commerce platforms and over 10 websites. Performance optimization of systems after development. UI/UX design and prototyping. Front-end and Back-end development.
Developed Laravel + VB apps used by 4+ councils and rural authorities across Zimbabwe. Focused on government and municipal system solutions.

projects.title: TM Pick n Pay E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Key developer of a comprehensive e-commerce webstore and mobile app serving over 100,000 customers. Features include inventory management, payment processing, and customer analytics.

projects.title: Taxcul App with AI Assistant
projects.description: A comprehensive web application for calculating various types of taxes in Zimbabwe. Built with Next.js, React, and modern web technologies.

projects.title: NLP Patient Referral Mobile App
projects.description: AI-powered mobile application for patient referral system using Natural Language Processing. Streamlines healthcare communication and patient data management.

projects.title: AFINET Customer Portal
projects.description: Telone, Zol like customer portal where customer can purchase fibre-based operations and data.

projects.title: Gramia School Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive school management system with web and mobile applications. Features student management, grade tracking, communication tools, and administrative dashboards.

projects.title: Housing Management System
projects.description: Complete housing management solution with tenant management, rent tracking, maintenance requests, and financial reporting capabilities.

testimonials.name: Delbert Chimbandi
testimonials.content: Tawona's work on the TM Pick n Pay platform has been exceptional. His technical expertise and attention to detail resulted in a system that serves over 100,000 customers seamlessly.

testimonials.name: Culverwell Venge
testimonials.content: Tawona was the lead developer of the Taxcul App, he delivered the project flawlessly and is very professional.

testimonials.name: Jeremy Gapiti
testimonials.content: Working with Tawona was a pleasure. He delivered multiple e-commerce platforms on time and exceeded our performance expectations. His full-stack skills are impressive.

testimonials.name: Mr. Zvakafa
testimonials.role: Faculty of Computer Engineering, University of Zimbabwe
testimonials.content: Tawona was our most consistent undergraduate student. His dedication to software engineering and problem-solving abilities make him stand out among his peers.

blog.title: Building Scalable E-commerce Platforms in Zimbabwe
blog.excerpt: Lessons learned from developing the TM Pick n Pay platform that serves over 100,000 customers. Key insights on performance, scalability, and user experience.

blog.title: AI and NLP in Healthcare: A Zimbabwean Perspective
blog.excerpt: How we're using Natural Language Processing to improve patient referral systems in Zimbabwe's healthcare sector. Technical challenges and solutions.

blog.title: From University to Industry: My Software Engineering Journey
blog.excerpt: Reflections on graduating with First Class Honors and transitioning into the software development industry in Zimbabwe. Tips for new graduates.
